doc.previous: The solution of the logistic map when r 2 is where the initial condition parameter is given by For rational after a finite number of iterations maps into a periodic sequence But almost all are irrational and for irrational never repeats itself it is non periodic and exhibits sensitive dependence on initial conditions so it is said to be chaotic
doc.after: for Since for any value of other than the unstable fixed point 0 the term goes to 0 as n goes to infinity so goes to the stable fixed point
